original_text: every nanosecond of the the new guy reminds you that you could be doing something else far more pleasurable . something like scrubbing the toilet . or emptying rat traps . or doing last year's taxes with your ex-wife .
generated_text:
1. "I'd rather watch paint dry than sit through this snooze-fest again."
2. "This movie is an insult to the very concept of entertainment."
3. "I'd rather stick needles in my eyes than watch this drivel again."
